    get_summary_stats

    get_summary_stats.Rd

    Compute all relevant summary statistics given a dataframes of all numerical columns.

    Usage

    get_summary_stats(data)

    Arguments

    data

    a dataframe

    Value

    a dataframe

    Examples

    X <- sim_clust(2, 100, dmin = 0.5, rmin = 0.3, nind = 10)
get_summary_stats(X)
#>                  x1          x2         x3         x4          x5          x6
#> mean     -0.1913476  0.40780630 -0.2353747  0.2708455 -0.12741356  0.21271989
#> sd        1.0944667  1.00717593  1.0868479  0.9460689  0.99781368  0.94803906
#> min      -2.3937298 -2.54490634 -2.7600327 -2.9801907 -2.83927731 -2.30522321
#> max       2.3315652  2.86266656  2.8875383  3.0793397  2.41359637  3.11239812
#> skewness  0.2349014 -0.16439745  0.1795646 -0.4242838 -0.05817644  0.18196958
#> kurtosi  -0.5127703  0.05961465 -0.2984438  0.7716029  0.09601901  0.04380049
#> q25      -1.0096487 -0.28990590 -1.1009839 -0.2903764 -0.72618216 -0.38500119
#> q50      -0.2516572  0.36715350 -0.2399026  0.4374791 -0.03721913  0.01898639
#> q75       0.5488803  1.13943069  0.5227764  0.8931337  0.45128214  0.95846421
#>                   x7         x8         x9         x10      group
#> mean      0.29177164  0.2703219 -0.3871574 -0.22925074  1.5000000
#> sd        1.05727883  0.9618576  1.1128731  1.08189708  0.5025189
#> min      -2.14036060 -1.7403831 -2.7442765 -2.95657333  1.0000000
#> max       2.65634089  2.8421002  3.1129741  2.08393479  2.0000000
#> skewness -0.06051088  0.0911441  0.2593819 -0.39502783  0.0000000
#> kurtosi  -0.58402981 -0.2596313  0.1503172 -0.46581415 -2.0199000
#> q25      -0.40046539 -0.4007352 -1.0077568 -0.88015709  1.0000000
